p: Functional aspects of DEGs were examined using gene GO databases. Firstly, DEGs from both timepoint sets were organized into a Venn diagram to eliminate redundancy of genes ( Figure 3a). The diagram showed 5314 DEGs shared between MEFD3plu/MEFD3min and MEFD5plu/MEFD5min and 3872 and 2912 uniquely expressed genes between MEFD3plu/MEFD3min and MEFD5plu/MEFD5min, respectively.
